fields.name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38
fields.description: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 is a versatile running shoe that offers responsive cushioning and a comfortable fit for all your runs.

fields.name: Adidas Ultraboost 21
fields.description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 is known for its energy-returning cushioning and sleek design, making it a favorite among runners.

fields.name: Brooks Ghost 14
fields.description: The Brooks Ghost 14 offers a balanced and cushioned ride, perfect for runners looking for comfort and support.

fields.name: ASICS Gel-Kayano 28
fields.description: The ASICS Gel-Kayano 28 provides stability and comfort, making it an excellent choice for overpronators and long-distance runners.

fields.name: New Balance Fresh Foam 1080v11
fields.description: The New Balance Fresh Foam 1080v11 offers a plush and cushioned ride, perfect for neutral runners seeking comfort.

fields.name: Saucony Ride 14
fields.description: The Saucony Ride 14 is known for its smooth and responsive ride, making it a versatile choice for runners.

fields.name: Hoka One One Clifton 8
fields.description: The Hoka One One Clifton 8 offers maximum cushioning and a lightweight design, ideal for long-distance runners.

fields.name: Mizuno Wave Rider 25
fields.description: The Mizuno Wave Rider 25 provides a smooth and responsive ride, making it a popular choice among runners.

fields.name: Salomon Speedcross 5
fields.description: The Salomon Speedcross 5 is a trail running shoe known for its aggressive traction and durability in challenging terrain.
